comments.author: IFalco
comments.body: 139k blocks already mined       j'ai la bite  bleue

comments.author: micdvd85
comments.body: I threw my ASIC on it, I have mined over 21,000 blocks in a matter of 10 minutes. The pool is saying that the block reward for each is 0 so I'm not getting any coins. The block explorer however, is saying that each of them is giving out 100 coins. Seems fishy to me.EDIT: Yeah, the block explorer is showing the 23,000 blocks that I have mined on the pool and the coins sitting in the address of BQNxry9RU8DLkG8h7ugWD5QSu1weeRHoMbIs  But the pool website itself is saying that I am not owed a single coin and that the block reward for each block I have mined is 0. Funny...It should also be noted that the difficulty is not changing at all, so with my ASIC on it I am now over 35,000 blocks mined with no increase in the difficulty to slow the chain down at all.

comments.author: EL MAOGO
comments.body: the pool does not pay it is not a good idea to mine in this pool

comments.author: NickyBleu
comments.body: Quote from: micdvd85 on May 11, 2022, 11:32:01 PMI threw my ASIC on it, I have mined over 21,000 blocks in a matter of 10 minutes. The pool is saying that the block reward for each is 0 so I'm not getting any coins. The block explorer however, is saying that each of them is giving out 100 coins. Seems fishy to me.EDIT: Yeah, the block explorer is showing the 23,000 blocks that I have mined on the pool and the coins sitting in the address of BQNxry9RU8DLkG8h7ugWD5QSu1weeRHoMbIs  But the pool website itself is saying that I am not owed a single coin and that the block reward for each block I have mined is 0. Funny...It should also be noted that the difficulty is not changing at all, so with my ASIC on it I am now over 35,000 blocks mined with no increase in the difficulty to slow the chain down at all.Hi,Thanks for your support. Since it was our launch there might be some technical synch issue with the coin server. You may pause your mining. We will assign our technical team to review it ASAP and get back to you. Please give us some time, until then pause your mining please. Thanks for understanding. Also give your email id or any contact details so that we can message you immdly. or else we post here. The CEO

The pool is saying that the block reward for each is 0 so I'm not getting any coins. The block explorer however, is saying that each of them is giving out 100 coins. Seems fishy to me.EDIT: Yeah, the block explorer is showing the 23,000 blocks that I have mined on the pool and the coins sitting in the address of BQNxry9RU8DLkG8h7ugWD5QSu1weeRHoMbIs  But the pool website itself is saying that I am not owed a single coin and that the block reward for each block I have mined is 0. Funny...It should also be noted that the difficulty is not changing at all, so with my ASIC on it I am now over 35,000 blocks mined with no increase in the difficulty to slow the chain down at all.Also My assurance to you. Whatever technical issues we have, I will make sure what belongs to you will be surely be yours. I can even transfer from our Premined Coins. Not to worry. Please allow us some time to sort this out. The CEO

comments.body: Quote from: micdvd85 on May 11, 2022, 11:32:01 PMI threw my ASIC on it, I have mined over 21,000 blocks in a matter of 10 minutes. The pool is saying that the block reward for each is 0 so I'm not getting any coins. The block explorer however, is saying that each of them is giving out 100 coins. Seems fishy to me.EDIT: Yeah, the block explorer is showing the 23,000 blocks that I have mined on the pool and the coins sitting in the address of BQNxry9RU8DLkG8h7ugWD5QSu1weeRHoMbIs  But the pool website itself is saying that I am not owed a single coin and that the block reward for each block I have mined is 0. Funny...It should also be noted that the difficulty is not changing at all, so with my ASIC on it I am now over 35,000 blocks mined with no increase in the difficulty to slow the chain down at all.Its Sorted out !!!!All your 45,000 Blocks (As of Now) had been paid out. Please check and confirm. Some cache and setting Issues.Thanks for your patience and confidence on us.Appreciate it !!!Keep Mining !!!!The CEO
